title: Chicken Tikka Masala
directions: In a 5-qt. slow cooker, combine the first 13 ingredients. Add chicken, jalapeno and bay leaf. Cook, covered, on low 4 hours or until chicken is tender. Remove jalapeno and bay leaf.

In a small bowl, mix cornstarch and cream until smooth; gradually stir into sauce. Cook, covered, on high 15-20 minutes or until sauce is thickened. Serve with rice. If desired, sprinkle with cilantro. Yield: 8 servings.
ingredients: 2-1/2 pounds boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-1/2-inch cubes
